Privacy & Terms

Welcome to Win Rate Calculator!

By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with the following terms of use. These terms outline the rules and regulations for using the Win Rate Calculator website, located at gamewinrate.cc. If you do not agree with these terms, please refrain from using this website.

Permitted Use

The Win Rate Calculator is provided as a free tool for personal use. You may:

  • Access and use the website to calculate win rates.
  • Share the website link with others for non-commercial purposes.

You must not:

  • Republish, sell, or rent any content from this website.
  • Copy, reproduce, or modify any part of this website for commercial purposes.
  • Use the website for any illegal or unauthorized activities.

Privacy Statement

This website does not collect, store, or share any personal information or input data provided by users. All calculations are performed locally in your browser, and no data is sent to external servers.

Liability Disclaimer

The results provided by this tool are based solely on the input data and are for reference only. While we strive to maintain accuracy, we do not guarantee that the website or its results are error-free or up-to-date.

Win Rate Calculator is not responsible for any losses, damages, or consequences resulting from your use of this website. Use it at your own risk.

Changes to These Terms

We reserve the right to update or modify these terms of use at any time without prior notice. By continuing to use the website, you agree to accept the updated terms.
